entries.question: Is the true God a glorified man?
entries.authorNote: God tells us He is not a man. Many ancient nations made gods of their heroes and great men when they died and later began to worship them. No man becomes a god when he dies.

entries.question: Where does the true God live?
authorNote: His home is far beyond the sky--so far that our minds cannot comprehend the distance. His home is called "Heaven".
